name: correspondence-case-record-ministerial
title: Correspondence Case Record – Ministerial
description: Correspondence received from Members of Parliament that require a response in the Chair’s or Chief Executive’s name. Also includes correspondence from Members of Parliament to Dept. of Health (DH) or Defra Ministers, which require a response in the DH Minister’s name.

resources.name: 2016 Correspondence Case Record - Ministerial - CE & Chair
resources.description: Correspondence received in 2016 from Members of Parliament that require a response in the Chair’s or Chief Executive’s name. Also includes correspondence from Members of Parliament to Dept. of Health (DH) or Defra Ministers, which require a response in the DH Minister’s name.
